alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 29 at 3:03AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR NEXT APPROACHING STORM... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches, except 10 to 20 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Locally higher amounts to 2 feet near the peaks and ridges of the Centennial Mountains and Lionshead Area. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph resulting in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains, Henry`s Lake Mountains, and Lionshead Area, including but not limited to Island Park, Kilgore, Ashton Hill, Raynolds Pass, and Targhee Pass. * WHEN...From early Thursday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially during the Thursday morning and Thursday evening commutes. Wind gusts in excess of 30 MPH near mountain highway passes as well as peaks and ridgelines may also result in areas of blowing and drifting snow and dangerous conditions in the backcountry.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
